content:
Sure, here's a table summarizing the differences between the Genesis GV70 3.5T Sport Prestige and GV80 3.5T Prestige:

| Feature | GV70 3.5T Sport Prestige | GV80 3.5T Prestige |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Size | Compact SUV | Midsize SUV |
| Interior Space | Less spacious | More spacious |
| Powertrain | 3.5L twin-turbo V6 engine with 375 horsepower | 3.5L twin-turbo V6 engine with 300 horsepower |
| Available Features | Sport-tuned suspension, heated and ventilated front seats, panoramic sunroof | 12.3-inch 3D digital instrument cluster, 21-speaker Lexicon premium audio system, ventilated front and rear seats |
| Price | Lower-priced SUV | Higher-priced SUV |

It's worth noting that availability, pricing, and features may vary depending on the model year and region. Be sure to check with your local Genesis dealer for the most up-to-date information.
